org.xlattice.corexml

Class CoreXmlTestCase

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • org.xlattice.corexml.CoreXmlTestCase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test

    public abstract class CoreXmlTestCase
extends junit.framework.TestCase
    JUnit's TestCase with some extensions. Supports tests for equality between XPath NodeSets and between serializations of XML fragments at the object model level.
    Author:
    Jim Dixon

      • noDelimCopy

        protected static java.lang.String noDelimCopy(java.lang.String s)
        Collapse all runs of delimiters in a String to a single space. XXX This didn't work. Modified to just to eliminate all delimiters. The problem was that the process sometimes introduces delimiters, for example between XML elements (comments, cdata). Needs more work.
